comment: I still remember the day we first met on the Delhi Airport. Never imagined that we'll become such good friends. You've become the part of my life which I never knew I was missing. Thanks for being there during tough times❤. And abhi to bs start h abhi aur memories banani h🙌.
name: Prashant Kumar

comment: You are the Aditi to my Naina🫂. We have been together since the first year of college and will be with each other hopefully till the end.❤️ Kaafi aage tk ki planning krke rakhi hai sath me(IYKYK)...sab execute krenge 😂 🌚
name: Mitika Bhadada

comment: Will really miss repeating all my double-meaning jokes just because you were lost in your own world (or pretended to be). Feel free to hit me up whenever something goes over the top of your head. All the best❤️
name: Dev Daftari

comment: Thanks for the wonderful memories in Campus and while on trips ✨🎀. You are really a wonderful person, stay the same always! and keep in touch after college ❤️ Wishing you all the best for the life afterwards.
name: Ujjwal Hendwe

comment:
You got. A Sweet personality and caring Nature , I still 
remember that one. Campus  walk in sy it was nice . Sometimes your silly questions really made me laugh , It was really difficult explaining some jokes to you..
but we found laughter even in that..
Keep twinkling , All the best for future !!!
name: Vansh Kathnawal

comment: Had a blast of fun during our time well-spent together. You are a sweet and curious person, ready to gossip always. Will remember our dance vibes together. Be even more happy and cheerful always yr!
name: Khushi Verma

comment: Times when we used to have fun together during covid were the best of times, n this bond will never go away. Some of the chill cse ppl I know, always smiling and laughing. All the best bro for future! Milte rhenge!!💫
name: Anushka

comment: Hello, Ritika with an H! We both truly believe in 'sharing is caring' 😂. I will miss our treasured gups 🤭✨
name: Aditi Mishra

comment: The Udaipur trip was so fun with you. Will miss our movie and cooking sessions, milte rehna 💗
name: Anshika Verma

comment: Had some fun conversations with you in Hall to shared BTP . Will remember how you always left the kettle on, with half of your water already vaporized!😂. Keep in touch!💗
name: Kanchi Pardhi

comment: Sweet and nice person ❤️. Had a great fun to be your roommate. Vo KitKat Vali story hamesha yaad rahegi 😁. Best of luck for future ahead!
name: Sakshi

comment: Sweet person, had a great time being your flatmate. All the best for your future, and stay in touch❤.
name: Neha

comment: Helpful Person..Always fun to talk to.. Bangalore internship was fun with you..All the best for your future😇.
name: Devesh Jindal
